basics.name: Maria Ayala
basics.label: Wealth Management Advisor
basics.summary: Maria Ayala’s mission is to help people reach their financial goals – this is what she is most passionate about. She has a degree in finance from DePaul University and prior experience in banking and corporate finance. She holds licenses in Life and Health, Series 6 and 63. Maria values transparent communication and takes a simple approach in educating her clients, while working hard to put her clients first.

location.address: 1910 S. Highland Ave, Suite 103 Lombard, IL 60148
